description: Solves the classic vehicle routing problem (VRP) to minimize total objective cost. Supports up to 3,000 visits and a time limit of 120 seconds for optimization. This endpoint offers a simplified option set and is highly optimized for common use cases, often delivering excellent performance with minimal configuration. For fine-grained control or uncommon constraints, consider the Advanced VRP endpoint (/advanced_vrp).

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifies the expected response media type and API version.
Must be "application/vnd.omelet.v2+json" to indicate version 2 of the OMELET Vehicle Routing API.

VersionedJSON.summary: Use v2 of OMELET JSON API
